TopicTitle: Tech Tree Manager - Plzzz Add in 1.1

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I hear what people want in their trees...wow is it too hard to make a tech tree manager with a graphical user interface so we can make our own???

I have to go thru every part cost and change them; every part that I 'NEED' moved to make my SIM challenging; this is the one gripe I have with KSP and now I am complaining.

The old tech tree loader for moving parts and placing them in nodes was the best - make one.

Cmdr Zeta

Hello,

Reiterating...however the current system is at least something so I am adding little kudos...my Tech Tree is almost done; almost completely revamped stock part placement...modified a few nodes for early allowance because the R&D is too low (100...should be 150 or more) there is a way to change this but I dont know how.

So I have to move every part by hand in their respective cfg's...archaic...treeloader and editor back in v 24 and earlier was the best gui system; try to add this and I be a happy camper; I can still add nodes but now I have to figure out the numbers.

And now I just realize, with every update I have to revamp all my Squad parts again...by hand; about 20 or so...ugh.

Zeta

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-03T10:49:05Z" title="05/03/2015 10:49  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 3, 2015</time> by Cdr\_Zeta**
